alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duplin County through 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beautancus, or near Warsaw, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Rose Hill, Bowdens, Beautancus, Kenansville, Sarecta, Faison and Magnolia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
